TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TransactedInstaller extends System.Configuration.Install.Installer

summary.span: 定義完全成功或失敗的安裝程式，並且保留電腦在初始狀態。

span.span: Defines an installer that either succeeds completely or fails and leaves the computer in its initial state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要在交易中執行安裝程式，將它們加入屬性這執行個體。To run installers in a transaction, add them to the property of this instance. ## Examples 下列範例會示範，和方法類別。The following example demonstrates the , and methods of the class. 此範例中提供類似的實作[Installutil.exe （安裝程式工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md)。This example provides an implementation similar to that of [Installutil.exe (Installer Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md). 它會與之前的該特定的組件選項安裝組件。It installs assemblies with the options preceding that particular assembly. 如果選項未指定組件前, 一個組件的選項會使用清單中沒有先前的組件。If an option is not specified for an assembly, the previous assembly's options are used if there is a previous assembly in the list. 如果 「 / u"或"/ 解除安裝 」 指定選項時，會解除安裝組件。If either the "/u" or "/uninstall" option is specified, the assemblies are uninstalled. 如果"/？"If the "/?" 或"/ 說明 」 提供選項，主控台就會顯示 [說明] 資訊。or "/help" option is provided, the help information is displayed to the console. [!code-cpp[TransactedInstaller#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/TransactedInstaller/CPP/transactedinstaller.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[TransactedInstaller#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/TransactedInstaller/CS/transactedinstaller.cs#1)] [!code-vb[TransactedInstaller#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/TransactedInstaller/VB/transactedinstaller.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Install(class System.Collections.IDictionary savedState) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Install (savedState As IDictionary)

param.name: savedState
param.span: ，其中這個方法儲存執行認可、復原或解除安裝作業所需的資訊。

span.span: An in which this method saves information needed to perform a commit, rollback, or uninstall operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫方法中所包含的每個安裝程式這個執行個體的屬性。This method calls the method of each installer contained in the property of this instance. 所參考物件`savedState`參數會更新以反映安裝狀態，在執行所包含的安裝程式。The object referenced by the `savedState` parameter is updated to reflect the status of the installation after the contained installers have run. 如果要將所有方法成功，方法呼叫。If all the methods succeed, the method is called. 否則，方法針對每個安裝程式呼叫。Otherwise, the method is called for each installer. ## Examples 下列範例會示範，和方法類別。The following example demonstrates the , and methods of the class. 這個範例會提供類似 InstallUtil.exe 的實作。This example provides an implementation similar to that of InstallUtil.exe. 它會與之前的該特定的組件選項安裝組件。It installs assemblies with the options preceding that particular assembly. 如果選項未指定組件，如果在清單中上一個組件，會採取先前的組件選項。If an option is not specified for an assembly, the previous assemblies options are taken if there is a previous assembly in the list. 如果 ' / u' 或 '/ 解除安裝' 選項指定，則會解除安裝組件。If the '/u' or '/uninstall' option is specified then the assemblies are uninstalled. 如果 '/？'If the '/?' 或 '/ 協助' 提供選項，則 [說明] 資訊列印至主控台。or '/help' option is provided then the help information is printed to the console. [!code-cpp[TransactedInstaller#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/TransactedInstaller/CPP/transactedinstaller.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[TransactedInstaller#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/TransactedInstaller/CS/transactedinstaller.cs#1)] [!code-vb[TransactedInstaller#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/TransactedInstaller/VB/transactedinstaller.vb#1)]

exception.span: 安裝失敗，正在進行復原。

span.span: The installation failed, and is being rolled back.

para.span: 所指定參數應該是空白時傳遞至方法。

span.span: The specified by the parameter should be empty when passed to the method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Uninstall(class System.Collections.IDictionary savedState) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Uninstall (savedState As IDictionary)

param.name: savedState
param.span: ，包含安裝完成之後電腦的狀態。

span.span: An that contains the state of the computer after the installation completed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫這個方法來移除先前已完成的安裝。Call this method to remove a previously completed installation. 這方法呼叫方法中的每個安裝程式在安裝期間設定屬性，以解除安裝任何資源。This method calls the method of each installer in the property to uninstall any resources set during installation. 解除安裝期間的任何例外狀況都會被忽略。Any exceptions during uninstallation are ignored. > [!NOTE] > 雖然和方法儲存電腦的狀態之後安裝檔案包含從`savedState`參數可能已刪除在某個時間點後安裝已完成。Although the and methods save the state of the computer after the installations, the file containing the from the `savedState` parameter might have been deleted at some point after the installation was complete. 刪除檔案時，如果`savedState`參數是`null`。If the file is deleted, the `savedState` parameter is `null`. ## Examples 下列範例會示範，和方法類別。The following example demonstrates the , and methods of the class. 此範例中提供類似的實作[Installutil.exe （安裝程式工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md)。This example provides an implementation similar to that of [Installutil.exe (Installer Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md). 它會與之前的該特定的組件選項安裝組件。It installs assemblies with the options preceding that particular assembly. 如果選項未指定組件前, 一個組件的選項會使用清單中沒有先前的組件。If an option is not specified for an assembly, the previous assembly's options are used if there is a previous assembly in the list. 如果 「 / u"或"/ 解除安裝 」 指定選項時，會解除安裝組件。If either the "/u" or "/uninstall" option is specified, the assemblies are uninstalled. 如果"/？"If the "/?" 或"/ 說明 」 提供選項，主控台就會顯示 [說明] 資訊。or "/help" option is provided, the help information is displayed to the console. [!code-cpp[TransactedInstaller#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/TransactedInstaller/CPP/transactedinstaller.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[TransactedInstaller#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/TransactedInstaller/CS/transactedinstaller.cs#1)] [!code-vb[TransactedInstaller#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/TransactedInstaller/VB/transactedinstaller.vb#1)]
